item.title: Blogging from a Python Jupyter Notebook
item.description: This is a follow on post to Stefan’s original to show how to generate a blog post from a Jupyter Notebook instead of an R markdown. This post itself started off life as a Jupyter Notebook which lives in the same content/posts folder as the other Rmd files used for the site. We’ll walk through how it became a blog post. The process is a little more complicated than for the Rmd files (since that’s what Blogdown was built for but we can still get it to work relatively easily.
